title: How do I View all Immunisations from the Patient Dashboard?
body:
Follow these steps to view all Immunisations from the Patient Dashboard:
Open the Patient Record
Click Dashboard to open the patient dashboard.
Navigate to the Summary
Click View Immunisations to open the full list of immunisations.
How do I View all Current Rx from the Patient Dashboard?
If you need further assistance please contact support on 1300 103 903 or email at support@medirecords.com
